directors.name: Scott Derrickson
directors.bio: Scott Derrickson is an American director, screenwriter, and producer known for his work in the horror and supernatural genres. He gained recognition for directing 'Doctor Strange' in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, showcasing his unique visual style and storytelling. His earlier works like 'Sinister' and 'The Exorcism of Emily Rose' earned critical acclaim for blending horror with psychological and legal drama elements.

directors.name: Mike Mitchell
directors.bio: Mike Mitchell is an American film director, producer, and voice actor known for his work in family-friendly films and animated features. His directing credits include 'Trolls,' celebrated for its vibrant visuals and musical storytelling. Mitchell also directed 'Sky High' and 'Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked,' showcasing his talent for blending humor, adventure, and heart in family entertainment.
